1.0.name: wordpress/feed-for-pending-comments
1.0.description:
Feed for pending comments is a simple Wordpress plugin that generates a RSS feed for pending comments on your website or blog. You can access the pending comments feed by visiting yoursite.com/pencom-feed.

This plugin is actually meant to go together with a recipe from IFTTT.com. By using this plugin and the site IFTTT.com, you'll be able to receive SMS everytime someone comments on your site. You can read the tutorial/guide on how to do it here : http://www.thelacunablog.com/?p=924

We post computer tips, guides and how to's. Visit us here: http://www.thelacunablog.com
